Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.20564013] HD50=3.3±1.9 μM against Human red blood cells .
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Function: Probably participates in a plant defense mechanism. Inhibitory effect on the growth and development of Helicoverpa armigera larvae suggests a role for the cyclotides in plant defense. Has hemolytic activity.
Sequence Information.PTM: Kalata-B2 is a cyclic peptide which contains three disulfide bonds 5-19; 9-21; 14-26.

Literature.Title: Plant cyclotides A unique family of cyclic and knotted proteins that defines the cyclic cystine knot structural motif.
